activities: We provide technology and services for mobile advertising to our clients. We collect various types of data on behalf of our clients to provide our services. We collect and receive information on consumers that view or interact with ads displayed in the mobile sites and applications from the publishers we manage. We also collect information from consumers viewing or interacting with ads for advertisers we manage that get displayed in the mobile sites of applications managed by our supply partners. This information includes, but is not limited to, browser identifiers, session information, IP addresses, browser cookies, device local storage cookies, device type (e.g. smartphone, tablet), mobile operator, device IDs (a number uniquely allocated to your device), geo-location information, mobile sites visited, mobile app used, impression and clicks on advertisements we display, and users actions within mobile sites and mobile apps. This information is only used to serve relevant ads to the users.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
